Dear Support,

I am a Java developer and was browsing through 
http://javaboutique.internet.com/tutorials/UnitTesting and I found this
tool to be very interesting. So I started testing my Classes through this
tool.

But I got a problem as mentioned below:

   I have installed the junit and was able to get the userinterface of
TestRunner but when I am giving the name of the test class in it, it is
throwing an error stating the class was not found and check the
configuration of  "Test collector". Could u please suggest me the solution
and how to get the result.

Thanks in advance,
Pratap.
